title: rpc filters, unprocessable payload and tg crash
body:
#### System information

Geth version: `tg version 2021.05.1-alpha`
OS & Version: Linux

#### Expected behaviour

When starting the daemon and without any connection, no errors.

#### Actual behaviour

When starting the rpcdaemon, an error is logged with high frequence and tg crashes at some point

#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour

Wait for tg to sync and run rpcdaemon on dual mode.

#### Backtrace

`rpcdaemon`
````
WARN [04-26|14:25:37.442] rpc filters, unprocessable payload       err="json: cannot unmarshal object into Go value of type types.Transaction"

````
